snippet: The leash-free walks of an 11-year-old Australian cattle dog prompted complaints, an online petition of support and a City Council meeting that drew crowds.
abstract: Residents of Elephant Butte, NM, come to an agreement about whether an 11-year-old Australian cattle dog named Blue, who is not owned by anyone and has been a fixture in the city for years, can walk around without a leash; the debate has caused sharp divisions in the town for two years.
lead_paragraph: The leash-free walks of an 11-year-old Australian cattle dog prompted complaints, an online petition of support and a City Council meeting that drew crowds.

headline.seo: In New Mexico, a City Divides and Unites for a Dog Named Blue
headline.main: City Divides and Unites for a Dog Called Blue
headline.print_headline: City Divides And Unites For a Dog Called Blue
